text: Abo bayamanisa abanye kunqulo luka-Allâh bathi: “Ukuba uAllâh Wayethandile sasingekhe thina noobawo bethu sinqule enye into ngaphandle kwaKhe, kananjalo sasingekhe salele ukwenziwa kwayo nayiphi na into kungekho (ngokoMyalelo) waKhe.” Benza njalo ke nabo bangaphambili kunabo. Ingaba abaProfeti babenoxanduva olwalulolunye na ngaphandle kokuvakalisa uMyalezo ngokucacileyo
